group_1.textLeft: Huh…you're going around to check in@on everyone…?

group_1.textRight: Yes…given how Ikumi has passed away,@and…um…various other things…
I want to cover the current state of@Magical Girls,
so that I can show others the truth.
That's why I'm starting with everyone@from Mikazuki Villa…

group_1.textLeft: (The truth…reality…)

group_1.textRight: …I know it's insensitive…

group_1.textLeft: Oh… No, it's not that…

group_1.textRight: It's fine. I wouldn't feel great either if the roles@were reversed...
But, thanks to Rii, I understand what needs@to be conveyed...
Even if all the Magical Girls end up disliking me,@I'm determined to proceed.
…And Aru also said that…
<Don't be shy, speak in your own words until@the very end!>

group_1.textLeft: I see…

group_1.textRight: By the way, um…@Where is everyone from Mikazuki Villa?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, well…
I think…Iroha is treating the injured…
Yachiyo is having a strategy meeting at the@Ryushinkan Dojo…
It seems that everyone else has things@to do, as well…

group_1.textRight: Is that so…@My timing was unfortunate, then…

group_1.textLeft: …I'm the only one with nothing to do,@so I'm making a picture book…

group_1.textRight: …Maybe I should come back later…

group_1.textLeft: Um, in that case…@Where are you heading now…?
You said that you were going to see everyone,@so…

group_1.textRight: Right, but…it'd be awkward to visit where@injuries are being treated.
I wouldn't want to interrupt a strategy@meeting, either, so…
I'll start by visiting places where I won't@cause trouble.
I'm a little worried, but Rii will protect me, so…
I'll go after Magical Girls who are fighting@Witches in Labyrinths…

group_1.textLeft: Labyrinths…!

group_1.textRight: When it comes to places where Magical Girls@gather…umm…

group_1.textLeft: Um, in that case, is it alright if I go with you…?

group_1.textRight: Huh…?

group_1.textLeft: M-my weapon is a shield, so I'll be able@to protect you, Kagome…
If there's a Witch in the Labyrinth,@then we'll be fine…
Besides, I often hang around Iroha and@the others, so…
Maybe my presence will make the people@you're interviewing less cautious…
Even if it's only for Kamihama Magical Girls…

group_1.textRight: …Ah, do you mean you'll be…my bodyguard…?
Surely, with Rii by my side and you as@my shield, I'll be safe.
I'd appreciate it, but are you sure…?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's okay. Thank you…

group_1.textRight: Likewise, I'm grateful. Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: Yes…!
(I can't keep running from reality forever.)
(I must face the truth, and take action…!)
(Right now, Kagome is using the power of@an Uwasa.)
(She is trying her best to save Magical Girls…)
(If I can protect someone like her,)
(then I can take action in reality…!)
